ingredients.ingredient: 1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch cubes
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cut squash into even-sized pieces for uniform roasting
Toss with oil and seasonings before roasting—don't add oil mid-cook
Roast at high heat (425°F) until edges are caramelized and interior is tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Would you like to add sweet or savory toppings like cinnamon or crispy sage?
